<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="">2b788f5cade20210cce525fc8b3731e1</macroponent><name>record_header_1/headerImageItem</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    if (api.context.props.table == 'sc_req_item') {
        return {
            headerImage: api.data.look_up_record_2.result.picture.displayValue,
            fieldLabel: "Test value" //Here only to support the required structure of the object
        }
    } else {
        return "";
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-29 20:19:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>a3788f5c9ce2021099d3c5703683becf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>record_header_1/headerImageItem</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Template App" source="x_1434439_my_tem_0">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Template App">7232625c53220210d9568cfbe92e8074</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a3788f5c9ce2021099d3c5703683becf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-29 20:19:10</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
